413150.name: Stardew Valley
413150.description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home?
413150.language: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, Hungarian, Korean, Turkish

945360.name: Among Us
945360.description: An online and local party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-15 players...in space!
945360.language: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Russian, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

1145360.name: Hades
1145360.description: Defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion, Transistor, and Pyre.
1145360.language:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

367520.name: Hollow Knight
367520.description: Forge your own path in Hollow Knight! An epic action adventure through a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes. Explore twisting caverns, battle tainted creatures and befriend bizarre bugs, all in a classic, hand-drawn 2D style.
367520.language:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Korean*, Simplified Chinese*, Italian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

620.name: Portal 2
620.description: The "Perpetual Testing Initiative" has been expanded to allow you to design co-op puzzles for you and your friends!
620.language:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Bulgarian, Greek, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
